adv.trappednewbie.requiem.tab.title: Stillborn
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.root.title: Meeting on the other side
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.root.descripti: Befriend the <icon:trapped_newbie:wandering_trader_head> <gold>Wandering Trader</gold> by using a Friendship Letter on them.
You can befriend other players too.
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.holder.title: <aqua>SoSeDiK's Universe
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.holder.descrip: Happy to see you with us!
<dark_gray>(note: this advancement always shows your current world)
Your entire existence depends on <owner>'s lucid dream
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.brave_new_worl: Fall into the void. Let's get into it!
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.first_possessi: Take control of some other mob
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.good_as_new.de: Cure your undead body into a human form
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.mere_mortal.de: Who needs immortality when the adventure awaits!
As a Panda, hit something with a Wooden Sword
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.first_drink.ti: Rivers of tears, puddles of dreams
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.first_drink.de: Drink some water (use <key:key.use> with a bare hand on a water source while sneaking)
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.get_a_sugar_ca: Harvest some Sugar Canes, typically located nearby rivers or an ocean
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.get_a_birch_ba: Remove the Bark from a Birch Log using an Axe (use <key:key.use> on Logs to strip them)
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.make_a_charcoa: Create a Charcoal Filter using Charcoal and two Papers
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.pick_up_some_w: Pick up some water into a container (Bowl, Bottle, or Canteen)
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.drink_pure_wat: Drink some purified water (a Charcoal Filter can be applied to the dirty water)
adv.trappednewbie.basics.tab.title: Back to the roots
adv.trappednewbie.basics.root.title: Back to the roots
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_branch.de: Get some Branches from the Leaves or a Deadbush
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_fiber.des: Get a Fiber from grass plants
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_twine.de: Create a Twine using three Fibers
adv.trappednewbie.basics.find_gravel.des:
Find some Gravel.

Note: you may break Grass Blocks/Dirt with a Rock until it turns into Gravel.
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_flint.des: Get a Flint from a Gravel
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_flaked_fl: Create a Flaked Flint by tapping with a Flint on any kind of Stone
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_flint_shea: Make Flint Shears using a Twine and three Flaked Flints
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_rough_stic: Make Rough Sticks by cutting a Branch with Shears or a Knife
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_fire.des: Make a Fire by using Rough Sticks (alternately clicking <key:key.attack> - <key:key.use>) in both hands (can be used to lit a campfire)
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_flint_ax: Make a Flint Axe using a Stick, a Twine and two Flaked Flints
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_log.title: A Tree Hater
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_log.descr: Attack a tree with an Axe until the Log pops out
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_chopping: Combine a Log with an Axe to make a Chopping Block
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_planks.des: Cut a Log on the Chopping Block to get some Planks
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_sticks.des: Make perfect Sticks by chopping Planks on the Chopping Block
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_grass_me: Make a Grass Mesh using two Sticks and Twines
adv.trappednewbie.basics.treasure_hunt.d: Get something special by sifting Gravel through the Mesh (click <key:key.use> on it with a Mesh)
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_dead_bush: Get a Deadbush to become a happy noob
Burn a Log to get a Charcoal
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_firestri: Make a Firestriker using a Charcoal, a Flint and two Branches
adv.trappednewbie.basics.not_spawn_campi: Place a Campfire in The End at 1.894.255 14 -804.312 coordinates
Place a Campfire at a World-Border-Corner
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_flint_kn:
Make a Flint Knife using a Stick, a Twine and two Flaked Flints
(Knifes allow getting Branches and Fibers more easily)
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_string.de: Obtain a String by killing Spiders
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_carpet.d:
Craft a Carpet
(once gained a human body, sitting on it will heal yourself)
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_wool.desc: Obtain a Wool from a Sheep
adv.trappednewbie.basics.sleep_in_bed.de: Create a Bed and sleep in it in the Overworld
<red>The bed will act as an escape point from the lucid dreams
adv.trappednewbie.basics.eat_a_roasted_s: Cook a Spider Eye on a Campfire and eat it to obtain a Weakness effect
Sleep with a weakness effect to start lucid dreaming
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_work_sta:
Construct a Work Station.

This will discover all available recipes in the recipe book.
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_flint_sh: Make a Flint Shovel using a Stick, a Flaked Flint and a Twine
adv.trappednewbie.basics.pathways.title: Pathways
adv.trappednewbie.basics.pathways.descri: Use a Shovel to create Dirt Paths <yellow>(they speed you up!)
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_clay_ball: Get a Clay Ball with a Shovel
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_pot.desc:
Make a Flower Pot
(you can store items inside of it!)
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_clay_kil:
Create a Clay Kiln on a Work Station.

Note: you need to create a Fire under the Clay Kiln to burn items in it.
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_stone.de: Burn a Cobblestone in the Clay Kiln to get a Stone
adv.trappednewbie.basics.moar_tools.desc: Craft a Stone Pickaxe, Axe, Shovel, Hoe, and a Sword
adv.trappednewbie.basics.body_helper.tit: Possessing someone else's body is hard…
adv.trappednewbie.basics.body_helper.des:
So why not take over it instead? Luckily, the human-like Zombies are perfect puppets.

Perform a «Soul Melancholy» ritual while possessing a suitable Zombie to link your souls and take complete control over its body.
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_totem_ba: Use a Knife on a Log while sneaking to carve a Totem Base
adv.trappednewbie.basics.perform_a_ritua: Use a Totemic Staff on a Totem Base and successfully finish a ritual

adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.root.descript: Weapons of choice for combat in a battle against the monsters of the darkness
Hit a mob with your Stick

Stay on Half a Heart for 6 Real-Life Hours without any Armor nor Potion Effects
